TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Syria, title = Syria, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Syria} }

S.FORM: Syria u Syria sa i labu nu Ya-Cuo, itiza i 35 00 N, 38 00 E. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 185,180 sq km. u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 183,630 sq km, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 1,550 sq km. hamin nu tademaw sa 17,185,170. kakalukan umah sa 75.80%, kilakilangan umah sa 2.70%, zumaay henay umah sa 21.50%. 1944 a mihcaan cacay a bulad cacay a demiad, pasubana' tu nika isiteked nu binacadan. 1946 a mihcaan sepat bulad pitu a demiad, sululen nu lenhekuo atu hemin hu binacadan a patizeng tiy si-li-ya . tapang ayza mukeliday pa-sa-el．a-say-de , matulin a malais a binacadan, kiwasak sa ayza namalais, makuwan nu mibulibulay na hiza u nisululan a binacadan, si-li-ya a sihu naluyaluyay a paculiay tu sihu atu miculiyenpang nu si-li-ya . tapang tusu nu kanatal u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Damascus. kakinginan nu kanatal demiad kakinging nu kanatal demiad sa 17 bulad 4 demiad. tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Bashar al-Assad, micakat a demiad sa i 2000 a mihca pitu bulad sabaw pitu a demiad. cunli u cunli nu Syria ayza sa ci Hussein Arnousn , micakat a demiad sa i 2020 a mihcaan 8 bulad 30 demiad. kakitidaan u sela nu si-li-ya 185,180 pin-fang-kung-li , pasuni alawan nu yi-se-liye ke-lan-kaw-ti , i satipan nu ya-cuo-ta-luo , malalutin atu tu-el-ci i saamisan malalutin in sawaliyan atu i-la-ke malutin i satimula tu ye-tan i teban nu satip atu timul, malalutin tu li-pa-nen atu pa-le-se-tan satipan silaed tu ti-cung-hay masasu paengaw atu say-pu-lu-se namaka satipan atu saamisa pasa wali atu timul masalaya a mangangiw. 全國可分為四個地帶: kapah a palasepaten ku sela nu binacadan . satipan u diheb laed nu tusaay a buyu', pasu 2841 m u satalakaway a buyu' nu binacadan i tebal nu satip atu timul siye-he-san teban nu satip atu amis mililis tu ti-cung-hay a enal 1831 km ku lalaya nu dadipasan u cayay ka adihay nu silutukay a sela. sawalian u makalalumaay talakaway a lala'. teban nu wali atu timu u bunabunakan nu si-li-ya makedal ku demiad nu si-li-ya "敘利亞" anu palalimaen misisis ku kakitidaan, tuluay a benis i, cacay a mihcaan tusa badaan izaw ku lima mm tu udad, malawa nu talakaway a buyu'. u lilis nu dadipasan tu saamisan a kakitidaan, u kutiay a demiad nu ti-cung-hay timulan a kakitizaan, u kutiay a bunabunakan, u sidamekay sela, u pitebanan nu binacadan, namaka 1980 a mihca a alingatu, mahica nakamuan a pananum, cayay patuku a mitdas a kakaumahan a sela, i teban nu wali atu amisay "AI Jazira" aut timulay "Hawran" u pitebanan nu kakaumahan. sawaliay a yu-huwa-la-ti-he u tatebanan nu binacadan a sauwac. mamin a kayzaan ku sawali a lala' nu binacadan. tiya makayza i-la-ke a tayzal puo-se-wan nikayzaan nu yu-huwa-la-ti-he 15 a binacadan, u sasakamuan ku kapahay ku nikaudip atipan a diheb i zaw ku a-si-he makayza i tu-el-ci a micumdi ti-cung-hay teban nu sati atu timu nu binacadan u tapang a tukay tay-ma-se-ke saamisanay a-le-puo atu huwo-mu-se u pitebanan a tukay nu si-li-ya a luma' a tukay mililis amin i dadipasa. singciw ayzaay a si-li-ya u i-se-lan-ciyaw ku tebanan a misinziya, mu-se-lin a tademaw 90%, 70% a tademaw u san-ni-pay kumud nu se-ye-pay maka 20%, se-ye-pay sibenis hen tu a-la-way-pay se-el-i-ma-mu-pay atu i-se-ma-yi-pay . matenesay tu ku laylay nu ciwlu nu si-li-ya , na u ciwlu a binacadan ku si-li-ya malingatu a idebung mikuwan ku baluhayay a i-se-lan-ciyaw maka ala tu 1000 a mihca, aluman ku misiziyaay nu si-li-ya tademaw tu ciwlu , nika ayza 100 a mihca malalais anabulaw tayza nutawan a binacadan, cayay tu kalecuh tu atungay, u misinziya tu ciwlu a tademaw mabulaw tu ayaytu ka adihay ku tademaw i binacadan, 10% tu ku tademaw u miciwluay nu si-li-ya . nika sibunawan han nu sihu ku misinziyaay tu ciwlu a tademaw. i niyazu' nu micuwluay a tademaw nu si-li-ya nu ukasi a-la-mi-i hen ku kamuen, luma' u ya-ce-di Te-lu-ce a misinziyaay atu dadaay a yu-tay a tademaw. laylay 2000 mihcaan 6 bulad 9 demiad, mapatay ku pamikuwanay 30 a mihca ci ha-fye-ce．a -say-de saka tusa a wawa 'a-sa-el．a -say-de mala satapangay nu binacadan. 7 a bulad 17 a demiad a alingatu. 2005 mihica 4 bulad 26 demiadmiduduc tu nalahecian nu liyen-he-kuo ku si-li-ya , manukas ku hitay namaka li-pa-nen masatelep mamilangat midebung tu li-pa-nen . 2007a mihcaan lima a bulad tusa bataan izaw ku sepat misingkiw tu saka tusa nu piut a mihca a mala satapangay nu binacadan, 97.62% ku misuluay a mala satapangay tangasa 2014 mihca. 2011/1/26 cung-tung a kakitizaan a binacadan macacengan u a-la-puo-ce-cung a kawaw, malingatu a simibulibulay tu sihu nu si-li-ya nika mapenec tu nu sihu. uyza mibulibulay tu sihu a tademaw malalais ayza atu sihu. 2013年8月, (Barack Obama) . 2013/8 u huwa-siye-u-ci ku sapipenec ni a-say-de tu binawlan nu nikuwanan niza mala salaecusay sakatalay ku balucu' niza i 21 se-ci nipihiza nizamibabelin tu nabalucuan nu tapang nu a-mi-li-ka ci u-pa-ma, malawit ku nihemheman nu balucu', nika cayay saybangi nu hitay nu huwa-fu, maselel ku nipalakapah tu a-mi-li-ka . 2015/9 midebung a miculuk ku hitay nu el-luo-se padamaan aca nu yi-lang mahizatu u sisapikpikay a tula' ci a-say-de malalaisay a kawaw nu labu nu si-li-ya malahic tu. 2015年5月," . 2015/5 yi-se-lan-kuo a masakaputay militawal tu nikalais nu labu nu binacadan nu si-li-ya matulin a micalap tu sela nu si-li-ya ayza maselep ku icelang nu yi-se-lan-kuo i si-li-ya nika cuwacuwaay a hitay nu si-li-ya . macacalaphen tu sela nu binacada, ayza nicalapan nu yi-se-lan-kuo tu sela nu si-li-ya , manunultu a alawan nu hitay nu sihu nu si-li-ya micaculiay tu sihu a hitay, ku-el-de a masakaputay tamedaw. 2019 (Idlib), . wamamalasawad ku 2019 a mihca, u micaculiay tu sihu a hitay mitalikul tangasa i yi-de-li-pu-sen , lalabaen nu sihu a hitay nu si-li-ya (敘利亞, saicelang sa a padama ku el-luo-se atu yi-lang tu hitay nu sihu, 300 a mang ku mapatayay nu maluay i yi-de-li-pu-sen a tademaw. maligatu namalais tangasa ayza satabakiay a nika lalais i labu nu binacadan satabakiyay a mihinang nu binawlan. 360 a mang tu ku nidiputan nu tu-el-ci tu tadema, milalang tu hitay nu sihu nu si-li-ya tu-el-ci "pey-ye-ceng-yen-kuo " sasa milais sa tu el-luo-se . . u tulin a malalais nu si-li-ya atu yi-se-lan-kuo , 20 a mang ku mapatayay nu tademaw, 800 a mang ku mihinangay nu labuay nu binacadan a tademaw, malawit nu tayzaay i nutaw a binacadan mihinang a tademaw. nu saka tusa satabakiay a nikalalais nu sikay, u saalumanay nu mihinangay nu tademaw.

Syria o Syria sa i labo no Ya-Coo, itiza i 35 00 N, 38 00 E. o ahebal no lala' mapolong sa 185,180 sq km. o ahebal no lala'ay sa 183,630 sq km, o ahebal no nanomay sa 1,550 sq km. hamin no tademaw sa 17,185,170. kakalokan omah sa 75.80%, kilakilangan omah sa 2.70%, zomaay henay omah sa 21.50%. 1944 a mihcaan cacay a bolad cacay a demiad, pasobana' to nika isiteked no binacadan. 1946 a mihcaan sepat bolad pito a demiad, sololen no lenhekoo ato hemin ho binacadan a patizeng tiy si-li-ya . tapang ayza mokeliday pa-sa-el．a-say-de , matolin a malais a binacadan, kiwasak sa ayza namalais, makowan no mibolibolay na hiza o nisololan a binacadan, si-li-ya a siho naloyaloyay a pacoliay to siho ato micoliyenpang no si-li-ya . tapang toso no kanatal o tapang toso no kanatal sa o Damascos. kakinginan no kanatal demiad kakinging no kanatal demiad sa 17 bolad 4 demiad. tabakiay a tapang no kanatal o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) ayza sa ci Bashar al-Assad, micakat a demiad sa i 2000 a mihca pito bolad sabaw pito a demiad. conli o conli no Syria ayza sa ci Hossein Arnoosn , micakat a demiad sa i 2020 a mihcaan 8 bolad 30 demiad. kakitidaan o sela no si-li-ya 185,180 pin-fang-kong-li , pasoni alawan no yi-se-liye ke-lan-kaw-ti , i satipan no ya-coo-ta-loo , malalotin ato to-el-ci i saamisan malalotin in sawaliyan ato i-la-ke malotin i satimola to ye-tan i teban no satip ato timol, malalotin to li-pa-nen ato pa-le-se-tan satipan silaed to ti-cong-hay masaso paengaw ato say-po-lo-se namaka satipan ato saamisa pasa wali ato timol masalaya a mangangiw. 全國可分為四個地帶: kapah a palasepaten ko sela no binacadan . satipan o diheb laed no tosaay a boyo', paso 2841 m o satalakaway a boyo' no binacadan i tebal no satip ato timol siye-he-san teban no satip ato amis mililis to ti-cong-hay a enal 1831 km ko lalaya no dadipasan o cayay ka adihay no silotokay a sela. sawalian o makalalomaay talakaway a lala'. teban no wali ato timo o bonabonakan no si-li-ya makedal ko demiad no si-li-ya "敘利亞" ano palalimaen misisis ko kakitidaan, toloay a benis i, cacay a mihcaan tosa badaan izaw ko lima mm to odad, malawa no talakaway a boyo'. o lilis no dadipasan to saamisan a kakitidaan, o kotiay a demiad no ti-cong-hay timolan a kakitizaan, o kotiay a bonabonakan, o sidamekay sela, o pitebanan no binacadan, namaka 1980 a mihca a alingato, mahica nakamoan a pananom, cayay patoko a mitdas a kakaomahan a sela, i teban no wali ato amisay "AI Jazira" aot timolay "Hawran" o pitebanan no kakaomahan. sawaliay a yo-howa-la-ti-he o tatebanan no binacadan a saowac. mamin a kayzaan ko sawali a lala' no binacadan. tiya makayza i-la-ke a tayzal poo-se-wan nikayzaan no yo-howa-la-ti-he 15 a binacadan, o sasakamoan ko kapahay ko nikaodip atipan a diheb i zaw ko a-si-he makayza i to-el-ci a micomdi ti-cong-hay teban no sati ato timo no binacadan o tapang a tokay tay-ma-se-ke saamisanay a-le-poo ato howo-mo-se o pitebanan a tokay no si-li-ya a loma' a tokay mililis amin i dadipasa. singciw ayzaay a si-li-ya o i-se-lan-ciyaw ko tebanan a misinziya, mo-se-lin a tademaw 90%, 70% a tademaw o san-ni-pay komod no se-ye-pay maka 20%, se-ye-pay sibenis hen to a-la-way-pay se-el-i-ma-mo-pay ato i-se-ma-yi-pay . matenesay to ko laylay no ciwlo no si-li-ya , na o ciwlo a binacadan ko si-li-ya malingato a idebong mikowan ko balohayay a i-se-lan-ciyaw maka ala to 1000 a mihca, aloman ko misiziyaay no si-li-ya tademaw to ciwlo , nika ayza 100 a mihca malalais anabolaw tayza notawan a binacadan, cayay to kalecoh to atongay, o misinziya to ciwlo a tademaw mabolaw to ayayto ka adihay ko tademaw i binacadan, 10% to ko tademaw o miciwloay no si-li-ya . nika sibonawan han no siho ko misinziyaay to ciwlo a tademaw. i niyazo' no micowloay a tademaw no si-li-ya no okasi a-la-mi-i hen ko kamoen, loma' o ya-ce-di Te-lo-ce a misinziyaay ato dadaay a yo-tay a tademaw. laylay 2000 mihcaan 6 bolad 9 demiad, mapatay ko pamikowanay 30 a mihca ci ha-fye-ce．a -say-de saka tosa a wawa 'a-sa-el．a -say-de mala satapangay no binacadan. 7 a bolad 17 a demiad a alingato. 2005 mihica 4 bolad 26 demiadmidodoc to nalahecian no liyen-he-koo ko si-li-ya , manokas ko hitay namaka li-pa-nen masatelep mamilangat midebong to li-pa-nen . 2007a mihcaan lima a bolad tosa bataan izaw ko sepat misingkiw to saka tosa no piot a mihca a mala satapangay no binacadan, 97.62% ko misoloay a mala satapangay tangasa 2014 mihca. 2011/1/26 cong-tong a kakitizaan a binacadan macacengan o a-la-poo-ce-cong a kawaw, malingato a simibolibolay to siho no si-li-ya nika mapenec to no siho. oyza mibolibolay to siho a tademaw malalais ayza ato siho. 2013年8月, (Barack Obama) . 2013/8 o howa-siye-o-ci ko sapipenec ni a-say-de to binawlan no nikowanan niza mala salaecosay sakatalay ko baloco' niza i 21 se-ci nipihiza nizamibabelin to nabalocoan no tapang no a-mi-li-ka ci o-pa-ma, malawit ko nihemheman no baloco', nika cayay saybangi no hitay no howa-fo, maselel ko nipalakapah to a-mi-li-ka . 2015/9 midebong a micolok ko hitay no el-loo-se padamaan aca no yi-lang mahizato o sisapikpikay a tola' ci a-say-de malalaisay a kawaw no labo no si-li-ya malahic to. 2015年5月," . 2015/5 yi-se-lan-koo a masakapotay militawal to nikalais no labo no binacadan no si-li-ya matolin a micalap to sela no si-li-ya ayza maselep ko icelang no yi-se-lan-koo i si-li-ya nika cowacowaay a hitay no si-li-ya . macacalaphen to sela no binacada, ayza nicalapan no yi-se-lan-koo to sela no si-li-ya , manonolto a alawan no hitay no siho no si-li-ya micacoliay to siho a hitay, ko-el-de a masakapotay tamedaw. 2019 (Idlib), . wamamalasawad ko 2019 a mihca, o micacoliay to siho a hitay mitalikol tangasa i yi-de-li-po-sen , lalabaen no siho a hitay no si-li-ya (敘利亞, saicelang sa a padama ko el-loo-se ato yi-lang to hitay no siho, 300 a mang ko mapatayay no maloay i yi-de-li-po-sen a tademaw. maligato namalais tangasa ayza satabakiay a nika lalais i labo no binacadan satabakiyay a mihinang no binawlan. 360 a mang to ko nidipotan no to-el-ci to tadema, milalang to hitay no siho no si-li-ya to-el-ci "pey-ye-ceng-yen-koo " sasa milais sa to el-loo-se . . o tolin a malalais no si-li-ya ato yi-se-lan-koo , 20 a mang ko mapatayay no tademaw, 800 a mang ko mihinangay no laboay no binacadan a tademaw, malawit no tayzaay i notaw a binacadan mihinang a tademaw. no saka tosa satabakiay a nikalalais no sikay, o saalomanay no mihinangay no tademaw.
